headline.main: Afghan Fighting Pressures Hospitals, Clinics: Children's Rights Group
headline.print_headline: Afghan Fighting Pressures Hospitals, Clinics: Children's Rights Group

lead_paragraph: Hospitals and clinics in Afghanistan have increasingly been targeted by armed groups over the past two years, weakening an already degraded health system, a children's rights group said in a report issued on Monday.
snippet: Hospitals and clinics in Afghanistan have increasingly been targeted by armed groups over the past two years, weakening an already degraded health system, a children's rights group said in a report issued on Monday....
